entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High 13. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
